Enums/ContactsNameStyle.html#/s:27Contac.name: short
Enums/ContactsNameStyle.html#/s:27Contac.abstract: Includes the given / first name only if available.

Enums/ContactsNameStyle.html#/s:27Contac.name: medium
Enums/ContactsNameStyle.html#/s:27Contac.abstract: A combination of first / given, middle and last name based on availability.

Enums/ContactsNameStyle.html#/s:27Contac.name: long
Enums/ContactsNameStyle.html#/s:27Contac.abstract: Includes prefix, first / given, middle, last name and suffix depending on availability respectively.

Enums/ContactsNameStyle.html.name: ContactsNameStyle
Enums/ContactsNameStyle.html.abstract: Describes the formatting style of the full name that will be displayed to the user.

Enums/ContactType.html.name: ContactType
Enums/ContactType.html.abstract: formatter which defines whether a user wants to pick an e-mail or a phone number.

Classes/ContactsSuggestionTextField.html.name: contactSelectedHandler
Classes/ContactsSuggestionTextField.html.abstract: Block which is called when a user selects a contact in the accessory view, returns a string version of e-mail / phone number.

Classes/ContactsSuggestionTextField.html.name: customize(block:)
Classes/ContactsSuggestionTextField.html.abstract: Utitized to customise the accessory view’s appearance.

Classes/ContactCustomizationBuilder.html.name: ContactCustomizationBuilder
Classes/ContactCustomizationBuilder.html.abstract: Used for customising the input suggestion accessory view’s appearance and behaviour.

Classes/ContactsSuggestionTextField.html.name: ContactsSuggestionTextField
Classes/ContactsSuggestionTextField.html.abstract: Custom Textfield used for attaching a custom accessory view acting as a contacts picker to the keyboard’s input accessory view.
